results.title: Care of the teeth
results.brief_description: The care of the teeth described in detail, showing approved methods of cleaning etc. Shows where decay starts, effect of abscesses, cause of narrow dental arches, fever teeth, straightening teeth and dental floss.

results.title: Care of the skin
results.brief_description: Encourages cleanliness by showing the daily grooming rituals of three children: Fred, Billy and Virginia. Portrays children as they prepare for bed, showing the proper way to wash hands and face and to bathe. Common skin ailments are illustrated. Animated diagrams describe the structure of the skin and explain why soap is necessary for cleanliness.

results.title: Care of the patient with Diabetes Mellitus (Uncomplicated)
results.creator_credit: F.E. Brooker and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description: Uses a typical case history to show how symptoms of diabetes may be recognised. Preceding with consultation, examination, and diagnosis, the film then follows the patient through stages in treatment at the hospital. A nurse teaches a patient how to administer insulin injections, regulate diet, and make the Benedict test for sugar in the urine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: F.E. Brooker and United States. Office of Education

results.title: Care of the patient with diabetes mellitus (complicated)
results.brief_description: Shows the nurses’ role in the diagnosis and treatment of coma and insulin shock, and the role of the nurse, doctor, dietitian, and psychiatrist in assisting the patient to develop a healthy mental attitude towards his condition.

results.title: Care of the newborn baby
results.creator_credit: John A. Haeseler, United States. Dept. of Education and Willard Pictures
results.brief_description: Instructs parents in the care, feeding, and bathing of a newborn baby, introducing the prenatal clinic where instruction is given to expectant mothers, the hospital or nursing home, and the district nurse who visits the mother after the baby is born.

results.title: Care of the feet
results.creator_credit: Dudley J. Morton and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
results.brief_description: Presents the structural elements of the foot as a weight-supporting structure; how walking is accomplished; depicts causes of structural foot ailments, and suggests remedies; shows other kinds of foot ailments and their diagnosis and treatment.

results.title: Care of the cardiac patient
results.creator_credit: United States. Office of Education and Willard Pictures
results.brief_description: Presents a complete case history of a typical cardiac patient from the initial attack and treatment to rehabilitation and return to a useful home life. The nursing care given to the patient includes comfort, rest, sleep, diet, feeding, elimination, cleanliness, and diversional and occupational therapy.

results.title: Care of St. Christopher's
results.brief_description: A typical day at St. Christopher’s Home for the Children of Railwaymen, at Derby. This establishment cares for children whose parents work in transport but are unable for some reason to provide a proper home for them. How the staff of the Home look after the well-being of the children and provide the family atmosphere and individual interest which are so badly needed by the homeless child.
